metadata.title: CVE-2016-7969 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The wrap_lines_smart function in ass_render.c in libass before 0.13.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via unspecified vectors, related to "0/3 line wrapping equalization." It was discovered that LibASS incorrectly handled certain ASS files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libass package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.13.4-2').
